Sentencas: A flame fuel cell setup is designed and built based on a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell and a two-layer porous media burner.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: The stable operation limits of the burner are obtained by adjusting the inlet gas velocity and the equivalence ratio.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: Methane fuel-rich flames are stabilized inside the burner from the equivalence ratio of 1.4-1.8.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: The effects of the equivalence ratio and the gas velocity on the temperature distribution inside the burner and the combustion products are studied.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: Using a burner efficiency based on lower heating values, up to 41.1% of methane was converted to H-2 and CO at the equivalence ratio of 1.7.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: The maximum mole fraction of H-2 and CO reached 9.32% and 8.18% respectively.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: Flame fuel cell experiments are carried out with different equivalence ratios.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: The tubular SOFC is directly heated up and reduced by the fuel-rich flame.
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Sentencas: The maximum power generated by the flame fuel cell reached 0.55 W at the equivalence ratio of 1.7 and the inlet gas velocity of 0.15 m/s. (C) 2016
Titulo: Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner

Power and heat co-generation by micro-tubular flame fuel cell on a porous media burner
